Compounds
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|おもて}}

# [[surface]]; [[face]] (visible side of an object)
# [[front]] (of a building), [[obverse]] side of a coin ("heads")
# [[cover]] attached to a surface
# outer [[clothing]]
# [[facade]]; [[appearance]]; [[outside]]; [[exterior]]
# [[public]]; [[official]]
# main [[entrance]] of a house; [[front door]]
# [[outside]] a house; [[outdoors]]; [[street]] in front of a house
# {{lb|ja|baseball|sort=おもて}} [[first half]], [[top]] (of an [[inning]])
# {{short for|表千家|tr=omotesenke|lang=ja|sc=Jpan}} Foundation of Fushin-an
# [[front room]]; [[living room]]
# {{lb|ja|computing|sort=おもて}} [[foreground]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Attached to a noun to indicate direction, location, etc.
